title: Arthur
short_plot_summary: Arthur, an anthropomorphic aardvark, navigates the ups and downs of childhood with his friends and family in the town of Elwood City.
explanation: Glasses, symbolizing Arthur's iconic appearance with his round glasses
A bear, representing Arthur's best friend Buster who is a rabbit; the bear is used here as there is no aardvark emoji
A book, illustrating the show's focus on learning and education
A rabbit, representing Arthur's best friend Buster who is a rabbit
A bus, symbolizing the daily school routine and adventures of Arthur and his friends
